select ot.OTID, ot.OTPRICE, ot.OTCOUNT, ot.ORDERS_OID, ot.OTDISCOUNT, ot.BOOKS_ISBN, b.BTITLE, b.BPUBLISHER, b.BDELIVERY_FEE, b.BIMG_LINK, b.BIMG_FILENAME, b.BCONTENT_TYPE, b.BFINAL_PRICE
from order_items ot, books b where ot.books_isbn = b.isbn and ot.ORDERS_OID = #{oid}
